revised_title: Elastic Scattering of Slow Electrons in Argon: Experimental Investigation and Analysis
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the elastic scattering of slow electrons in argon gas. They measured the angular distribution of electrons scattered over a wide range and observed pronounced maxima and minima in the scattering curves, which are similar to those representing the scattering of light by small spheres. This research provides further insight into the Ramsauer effect and the behavior of electrons in atomic fields.
